name: imcli

body.origin:
|- wcel(cfv(cim, c0), cr)
-| wcel(c0, cc)
-| wi(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(cfv(cim, c0), cr))

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(cfv(cim, c0), cr)
-| wcel(c0, cc)
-| wi(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(cfv(cim, c0), cr))

comment: The imaginary part of a complex number is real (closure law). (Contributed by NM, 11-May-1999.)
